entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cobourg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:17 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.6°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning before morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
